-e ---

# House of the Stag

𒄎 stag ≈ siᵗigi 𒅆

𒄎 𒄊·𒇻𒅆;𒇻𒅆 lulim;lu-lim

𒀉 𒇻𒅆 a₂.lu.lim; Alulim 'stag'; Ἄλωρος λάφι láfi Läufer

𒀀𒀀𒈝 aya-lum stag

𒅀𒇷 ⲉⲓⲟⲩⲗ אַיָּל ayál

𐀁-𐀨-𐀡 ˢe-ra-po cervo stag

𒀀𒀀𒈝 aya-lum stag

𒅀𒇷 ⲉⲓⲟⲩⲗ אַיָּל ayál

First early 'king' whose name appears first on numerous Sumerian King Lists.
Ruled for many millelia.

𒅀𒇷 ia-li ⲉⲓⲟⲩⲗ eioul אַיָּל ayál 𐎓𐎊𐎍 ʿyl եղջերու jelen < ełǰeru < el deer
ǰer.Vieh eláfi ελάφι ⋍ cervo ⇔ ǰeru 雄鹿 lù

hǰer.os : Hirsch ⇔ hurt, Gyros?

𒀉𒇻𒅆 a₂.lu.lim; Alulim 'stag'; Ἄλωρος first 'king' whose name appears first on numerous Sumerian King Lists
𒀉𒇻𒅆 | stag | 𐎓𐎊𐎍 ʿyl אַיָּל ayál
𒀉𒇻𒅆 | stag | ελάφι eláfi ἐλάφιον eláphion diminutive of ἔλαφος élaphos
𒀉𒇻𒅆 | stag | αρσενικό arsenikó
𒀉𒇻𒅆 | stag | deer > cervo > hjörtur Hirsch
𒀉𒇻𒅆 | stag | •Ha₂.ru.še₃ Hirsch

λάφι n (láfi, “deer” (colloquial)
ελαφίνα f (elafína, “doe”
ελαφάκι n (elafáki, “fawn”
ελαφηβόλος m or f (elafivólos, “deer hunter”
ελαφήσιος (elafísios, adjective)
αλαφιάζω (alafiázo, “to panic, to stampede”
